website_summaries.verdict: This model is a great unisex choice for riders at all levels but especially those who have never worn a fitted bike helmet before.
pros: Molded foam and plastic shell mesh perfectly
A padded chin strap is a nice additional feature
cons: Fit and comfort level are variable
Not comfortable for some with larger heads
Strap adjustment system is a challenge
Visor can cause injuries during an accident

customer_reviews.title: Prevention of closed head injury
customer_reviews.text: Fortunately I replaced my 10+ yr old helmet with this strong lightweight helmet a few months ago to go go on a 100 mile ride without incident but two weeks ago crashed when I stood up to get increased speed and my shoe clip slipped off the pedal and my handlebars jerked to the right at 20+ mph and I was thrown off sustaining a right clavicle,scapular and 3rd rib fractures....wow what pain...but no head injury due to this helmet...no concussion...helmet intact! Highly recomme
customer_reviews.author: robert feldman

customer_reviews.title: Thought she din't need a helmet
customer_reviews.text: My wife said she did not need a helmet, that it looked silly and felt weird. I convinced her to wear the Airflow anyway. Well on her first ride with it she crashed and her head bounced off the ground...no head damage, but numerous abrasions on her leg. Do you have a helmet for the rest of the body?
customer_reviews.author: Nemo

customer_reviews.title: After head injury needed a great product
customer_reviews.text: I am an avid mountain biker and at 34 suffered a severe traumatic brain injury. I had to park the bike for 2 summers. Now that I'm back in the swing of things I started researching helmets and impact ratings. This helmet for the price is amazing. It fits great and is fully adjustable. Looks sporty with a removable visor and the airflow is great as well. After searching and finding helmets for $80+ the reviews on this one are great and so is the price for the impact rating. Customer service is also A+. I highly recommend this product for anyone and especially if you have suffered a head injury. Worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Gutwein III

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.text: An absolutely fantastic helmet! The strap system is the cleanest and most comfortable I've ever worn. And I thought the box was empty upon arrival, this thing is crazy lightweight. I haven't crashed with it yet, so no testament to survivability, but so far I've loved every second in it.
customer_reviews.author: Liz A.

customer_reviews.title: The airflow across my head is awesome. I ride my bike to work and really ...
customer_reviews.text: My first reaction to this helmet was negative based on how light it was. I was wrong. It is light but it is not weak. I have no doubt my head is protected. The airflow across my head is awesome. I ride my bike to work and really don't want to be a sweaty mess when I get there. This helmet is perfect for that.
customer_reviews.author: USAF93

customer_reviews.title: finally ... a helmet that rocks!!
customer_reviews.text: just looking at the lines of this helmet, i can see the company's #1 concern is safety. (so far so good: no crashes ... yet i sense it will protect me better if i do go down.) it's light and stylish ... but seems stronger ... maybe because of its design? so well done, guys!! all my future helmets will be yours ... p.s.: it fits like a glove, with or without a skull cap or wool hat ... A+++++ 100% x 10
customer_reviews.author: Pete Lake

customer_reviews.title: nicely ventilated for great airflow
customer_reviews.text: I replaced a cheap/heavy Bell helmet with this one. It is incredibly light, nicely ventilated for great airflow, features an easily adjustable chinstrap (which is very comfortable) and has the adjustor wheel for the headband. There is also a visor that can be easily put on and taken off. I prefer to use the visor only when trail riding and when road biking in the down position it can obscure the vision a bit. This helmet has all the good qualities of a 100-300.00 helmet at a fraction of the price. I'd absolutely buy it again and highly recommend it. Happy riding
customer_reviews.author: B. Hicks

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: My helmet came well packaged and on time. I was impressed with the amount of ventilation, living in Florida, that’s important. I would definitely buy this again. Just for novice riders, I thought I would mention that you should replace if cracked but even if it isn’t, it should be replaced every couple years. Also, when not in use it should be kept in a cool dry area.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Loved it!!
customer_reviews.text: I'm very happy with my helmet, it fits me perfectly and it was the one I wanted, and the best part is that I bought my wife a helmet as well and she loved it! That makes feel very satisfied and I want to thank you team obsidian for checking on me to see if the product was good, I really appreciate that, but nothing to worry,''ITS AWESOME". Thanks again and keep up the good work guys.
customer_reviews.author: LJ. Bailey

customer_reviews.title: Shock absorption technology
customer_reviews.text: This is my first bike helmet, ever. I was concerned about overheating, so def wanted a helmet with vents. In cool weather I either wear a headband over my ears, or hood from windbreaker or down coat under the helmet. I had no trouble with adjustments, size, or hearing. I would rather have a blinking light on the back for safety, but probably way cheaper to stick my own blinker on. I was looking for the shock absorption technology, and found it here. Reasonable price. Luckily have not tested the shock absorption, but glad to know that someone has put some forethought into it.
customer_reviews.author: BLBA

customer_reviews.title: better than my old helmet
customer_reviews.text: I liked the adjustment knob at the back to make a more secure and comfortable fit. I like the cushion under the strap that goes under the chin. The straps were easier to adjust than other helmets I have used, but still not as easy I think they should be. It still took me about four attempts to get it right, but that is better than the 10+ attempts I have needed in the past. This is the best helmet I have used, but I will never give 5 stars to a bike helmet until someone invents a simpler strap adjusting mechanism. I would buy this helmet again.
customer_reviews.author: John Johnston

customer_reviews.title: This helmet has saved my life, and it will save yours.  Well, at least, it postponed my death.
customer_reviews.text: In the last couple of years, I've had two bicycle accidents - one was my fault, and the second one I got doored by a drunk hopping out of an Uber. Both of those accidents would have killed me if I hadn't been wearing a helmet. This helmet saved my life - and then I threw it away. No helmet can be trusted to protect you again after it's taken a serious whack.
customer_reviews.author: Michael C DC

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, Lightweight, great fitting helmet.
customer_reviews.text: Pleased with this helmet, the fit and comfort of this helmet is wonderful. It is lightweight, has padding that is removable (for washing), the straps were just right, with ample adjustment and straps also had a chin pad (again removable). To get the right fit it has a rear dial type adjustment to get the helmet as snug as you like. The helmet has ample air vents all around to keep your head cool. It comes in 2 sizes Small/Medium (54-58cm head size) and Medium/Large (58-62cm) my head size was 55cm and the Small/Medium was perfect. Highly recommend this helmet.
customer_reviews.author: TripMaker

customer_reviews.title: This is a great helmet. Fitting chart is accurate
customer_reviews.text: This is a great helmet. Fitting chart is accurate. Very adjustable to get a custom fitting. Chin strap is easy to adjust and get shaped around ears and neck. The chin guard is smooth and does not feel uncomfortable. Very good quality build. Removable visor is nice for riding in dark or putting on while riding during day. Not bulky and fits like a hat. This is a helmet you would not dread putting on which is important. Can't protect your head if you are not wearing it.
customer_reviews.author: Davis

customer_reviews.title: Good Value and Protector for my Noggin
customer_reviews.text: Team Obsidian Helmet fits well, is relatively light with plenty of air holes to ventilate while riding in hot weather like Phoenix. It's a terrific value (under $100) and highly rated by the "riding experts". It's not as comfortable or light weight as the CIRO Synthe but it's a fraction of the cost. The Obsidian is a good alternative to the pricey, high end helmets and does a solid job protecting your head. I would recommend the heltmet to friends and families.
customer_reviews.author: Average Joe

customer_reviews.title: Great helmet
customer_reviews.text: I had been shopping for new helmets for my wife and I and had come back to this one several times but never pulled the trigger. I'm so glad I finally did. I was a little worried about the black color (white not available) due to the heat where we live. This helmet is great however, and very cool due to awesome ventilation. Comfortable fit, and It is about half the weight of my previous Bell helmet. I would highly recommend to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Don L. Brady

customer_reviews.title: I just couldn't justify the price being a Giro Knock Off and Crappy comfort inner padding. CHEAP
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't see the quality some people thought they were getting. These Helmets are Not Even MIPS Certified and the price is **WAY HIGH** I returned them for Three Reasons. 1. Cost for what you get. 2. Inner Helmet Padding Setup. * Non-Existent* Comfort-wise. 3. Sizing was not a good fit for me. Altogether I was disappointed on three frons that I felt if **You Knock Off A Product like Giro you better do a goo-OR better job in product build and fitment comfort all of which fell far short here.
customer_reviews.author: Wizeguyy

customer_reviews.title: Generous fit and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I had a 'one size fits all" helmet that in fact did not. I got the L/XL Airflow from TeamObsidian and it fit wonderfully. Often my issue is that the chin strap is not long enough. This one has length to spare. When riding you can feel the air flowing through the helmet, unlike many other designs. Also the fit is supportive. It has just a little extra in the back to gently wrap around your head keeping it on just right.
customer_reviews.author: Michael K.

customer_reviews.title: Sweat bands disintegrate - Do NotBuy
customer_reviews.text: I used this helmet for about 6 months before the sweat bands inside the helmet fell apart. I bought it because of the many favorable reviews but as you may know many reviews on Amazon are fake and this is probably one example, as I cannot believe I'm the only one this has happened to. I've had my last helmet for about 10 years and this has not happened to it.
customer_reviews.author: W. Butler

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the premium price
customer_reviews.text: Save your money, not worth the price. It feels like a rock on your head, virtually no padding. Yes it's cool, but very uncomfortable. Basically a cheap product at a Cadillac price.
customer_reviews.author: robt reck

customer_reviews.title: Great fitting helmet and seller
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with the helmet. Fits perfect as I am usually between sizes. Like the adjustment features so I can add a head cover for cold mornings and still have a comfortable fit. Very fast delivery and responsive seller. Contacted me before I got the helmet to let me know it was on its way. Let me know that if there was any issues from the shipping that they would address them.
customer_reviews.author: Pat R

customer_reviews.title: GR8 Helmet
customer_reviews.text: Read reviews, did some research & made a decision. Shipped quickly, fit great, comfortable, stable and GR8 ventilation compared to my other helmet. Hopefully I'll not have to follow up on this review from "practical" experience. Shout out to Julia M. @ Team Obsidian for her great follow up when I registered my helmet. If you're thinking about it just click BUY NOW and move on; you'll be happy you did.
customer_reviews.author: COME ON MAN!!

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight, adjustable fit helmet that met my needs perfectly.
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight, adjustable fit helmet that met my needs perfectly. I'm simply riding for exercise on a hybrid style bicycle. I wanted to replace an older helmet simply to ensure aging plastic didn't fail me in an accident. I read a lot of reviews and have not demanding needs when it comes to a bicycle helmet. Therefore I wanted a price point that was not exorbitant while still providing a well reviewed product. This met my expectations perfectly and I would gladly recommend it to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn J. Burke

customer_reviews.title: great airflow, fits nicely
customer_reviews.text: This helmet is very lightweight, great airflow, fits nicely, no pressure points. Paid more for it than i had planned on spending on a helmet but im glad i did. Edit: still love this helmet almost a year later. Oh and it dosnt make you look like a bobble head like many helmets
customer_reviews.author: StraightUpReviewsTop Contributor: Hydroponics

customer_reviews.title: and it fits very comfortably, and it is well made
customer_reviews.text: I am an adult with a Segway. This helmet is just what I needed, and it fits very comfortably, and it is well made, by comparison to cheaper bike helmets that it is replacing. I am a 7 1/2 and it will go to 7 3/4 without difficulty. I am sure that it will provide sufficient protection given the sturdy outer shell and polystyrene padding. Lightweight and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Milton

customer_reviews.title: A visor is critical in the desert, and this one doesn’t work
customer_reviews.text: This helmet claims to have a sun visor. Unfortunately, as we found out riding through high desert, the visor clearly doesn’t fit the helmet. I ended up fitting an old Bell visor on with a rubber band - it worked! I would return it if I had tried it in time. Given the cost, this helmet deserves zero stars. I guess Bell knows how to build helmets.
customer_reviews.author: A. Meyer

customer_reviews.title: Great product and support team
customer_reviews.text: After a minor sizing issue, now thanks to what I consider one of the best support teams I have worked with, all is well. This is a great bike helmet. It has very nice inside padding, a two way adjuster and a padded chin strap. Fit adjustments were very easy to make, it is very comfortable and looks great. I have not and hope I never do have to test the crash durability of the helmet.
customer_reviews.author: LM

customer_reviews.title: Well made, comfortable and secure
customer_reviews.text: The helmet is adjustable in the front and the back. It is very light weight with plenty of air vents to keep you head cool. We are avid cyclists and live full time in Florida. These helmets are help prevent head injuries and are stylist too.
customer_reviews.author: Annabelle's Kitchen

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PRODUCT , CUSTOMER SERVICE AND PRICED RIGHT
customer_reviews.text: This is the second Obsidian helmet I bought. The first one was great- lightweight and cool and fit fine. It also saved my life recently after a fall. So naturally I bought another one with a couple of new added features that makes it m. Julia is great in helping customers- responsive, professional and accommodating. Would highly recommend. ore comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Mark B.

customer_reviews.title: This helmet is a winner great fit comfortable with max air flow design the padding ...
customer_reviews.text: This helmet is a winner great fit comfortable with max air flow design the padding is exceptionable and replaceable too! If you looking for a fantastic riding helmet I highly recommend this one to you! And, no I do not work for the company or have been given anything for my review just straight up my honest experience with the helmet...but of course I could use some extra pads... :)
customer_reviews.author: tekz

customer_reviews.title: Nice and lightweight
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my son, an avid cyclist. He was delighted with the sleek design and the lightweight of the helmet itself. I did a lot or research on this helmet before purchasing and was very happy with the evaluations I could find on other sites regarding conformity with safety requirements. The size seemed true and he said it felt very comfortable on his head. The lines of the helmet are good and will not encumber vision in any way. All around a very positive purchase.
customer_reviews.author: C. Lee

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable and adjusts easily with the wheel on the back ...
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding bike helmet. Very comfortable and adjusts easily with the wheel on the back of the helmet. Has many aerodynamic vents around the helmet and at the same time is stiff enough to be very protective as well. Bought a second helmet for my wife who is very hard to fit for bike helmets in the past but, guess what it fits perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: George A. Bryans

customer_reviews.title: Chin clip is defective
customer_reviews.text: We were very excited to receive a better bike helmet as we got more into biking. However, my wife and I are very disappointed with the product. Each day before we ride, we have to re-attach the red chin clip. It falls off all the time. We will be asking for replacement helmets.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very good helmet
customer_reviews.text: Highly recommend this helmet. True to size and can be adjusted. My head size is 57cm, ordered s/m and it fits great, a tiny tightening adjustment and perfect fit. Easy dial in the back to do adjusting even when you ride.
customer_reviews.author: Hanna-leena Joseph

customer_reviews.title: So comfortable and such a perfect fit!
customer_reviews.text: It looks good on me. It has a perfect fit. Not too tight and not too loose which provides a good blood circulation. I didn't feel dizzy even after a long ride this morning. Good airflow which minimizes head perspiration and unwanted odor. The clasp looks sturdy as well. Great helmet overall!
customer_reviews.author: Pegz

customer_reviews.title: Good helmet at a good price
customer_reviews.text: A good helmet with the look and feel you look for in a quality helmet. My only reservation is that the side adjustment points under your ears don't have toggles to lock in the setting you like. It still works fine, but this way, those buckles stay moveable. But overall, it's a comfortable, good coverage helmet.
customer_reviews.author: M. Rafferty

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made helmet.
customer_reviews.text: This is the cheapest made helmet, I have ever seen. It is only my backup helmet and therefore not used a lot, but every time I do, I wonder, how much of a protection it really provides. It was a replacement for my Giro helmet of similar price, which was actually a real helmet. So after two year of avoiding using it, I will properly dispose of it.
customer_reviews.author: KLAUS P THIEDE

customer_reviews.title: Great Lightweight Helmet
customer_reviews.text: Love that this helmet is so light weight. I get a fair amount of with noise while riding fast but I am new to biking so I don't know if this is a normal thing or just this helmet. Either way, no complaints with this helmet and I feel safe in it.
customer_reviews.author: Shelly

customer_reviews.title: Well-designed & comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I have one that I have been using for 2 years. This one I bought it for my partner, who really likes it. It is well-designed, quite light and easy to adjust so that it fits well to your head. At the same time, parts are flimsy and cannot be handled roughly. I wouldn't recommend for mountain bikers.
customer_reviews.author: busterdog

customer_reviews.title: Good fit and very comfortable with no excues not to wear when rideing my bike.
customer_reviews.text: The Obsidian Unisex Airflow Bike Helmet is a high quality product that is very comfortable to wear and can be adjusted to fit .I was surprised at the comfort while riding my mountain bike I will be ordering a Obsidian Helmet for my grandson this year.
customer_reviews.author: Ron & Jane

customer_reviews.title: Great Helmet for the $$
customer_reviews.text: Really nice helmet for the price. I love the fit. Very comfortable. Hope I never have to test it for impact! :)
customer_reviews.author: K. Dean

customer_reviews.title: Fits as expected and the straps are perfect. They easily adjust
customer_reviews.text: Fits as expected and the straps are perfect. They easily adjust, hold the helmet on properly and don’t bunch up. The adjustable knob at the back of the helmet snugs-up the entire helmet evenly to your head and can be as snug or loose as you want. I’ve been wearing Gyro helmets for over 20 years of mountain biking and I’m just not happy about their fit anymore.
customer_reviews.author: GoodToBeBob

customer_reviews.title: It is rated well and is comfortable to wear
customer_reviews.text: The helmet is lightweight and very comfortable. I use it in Southern Florida and find it quite comfortable. The size adjustment was easy as advertised. The helmet was promptly delivered and was securely packaged.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph L Verfenstein

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, Great helmet!
customer_reviews.text: Support tech Julia was very helpful answering my questions. I have never worn a helmet my entire biking life but thought it was better to be safe than sorry. After reading many good reviews and recommendations on this helmet, I ordered it. No complaints, excellent product, highly recommend! Very comfortable. (looks good too!)
customer_reviews.author: Hans

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: feels great on. luckily haven't had any falls to test it. nice looking helmet also. the strap adjustment is a little awkward, but honestly this is my first bike helmet so maybe they are all awkward. very pleased for the few months i have been wearing it!
customer_reviews.author: B. Coley

customer_reviews.title: Great helmet for riding in the heat
customer_reviews.text: It’s been close to 110° every day in Vegas for the last several weeks. I’ve been able to ride my bike with relative comfort using this helmet. I highly recommend this product if you live in hot weather climate. To Helmet also has a perfect fit.
customer_reviews.author: ZAZU WANG

customer_reviews.title: Airflow Bike Helmet
customer_reviews.text: This was purchased for my husband. After researching several options he decided on this helmet. It’s definitely lightweight, love the black matte finish and believe it will provide protection if needed.
customer_reviews.author: pa

customer_reviews.title: Nice helmet
customer_reviews.text: Check out the photos. I am wondering was the helmet damaged cuz the box is messed up. Should gotta discount. It’s light n looks good. I would recommend that the designers add a little more padding tho which I will do I think. Other than that it looks v nice in fairness. Pretty slick.
customer_reviews.author: D B

customer_reviews.title: We love to bike and do so frequently
customer_reviews.text: Team Obsidian and their supplier, Giro, hit the ball out of the park. I bought two helmet's; one for me and one for my wife. We love to bike and do so frequently. Living in Florida we needed a light weight, safe helmet that promotes air flow through and over our heads for cooling. Giro makes the model. Team Obsidian makes the order fulfillment process absolutely painless. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Tom Davis

customer_reviews.title: Snug, easily adjustable, cool
customer_reviews.text: I bought this helmet because my old one was compromised from an abrupt intersection of my path with that of a dog. This lightweight helmet is cooler (literally) than most. The adjustments are also more easily made than other helmets with more common brands I have owned in the past.
customer_reviews.author: R. Baker Kearfott

customer_reviews.title: Best helmet I've Found
customer_reviews.text: Third bike helmet for me and I won't be trying anything else. You can probably find something for half the cost but it won't have the combination of light weight, looks, and features. I've been rolling with this thing on my head for two weeks now and it is easy to forget that I'm wearing a helmet at times.
customer_reviews.author: Chief Financial Officer

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Great for the price. I have had 300 dollar helmets and this is just as good. Can’t say how it would fair in a collision but seems well made. For flats and casual riding this will do fine. If I were still doing mountain I would spend no less then 300, it is your head.
customer_reviews.author: bonna bing

customer_reviews.title: Nice price. Nice fit
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my husband. He doesn’t care for helmets. But I insisted since he’s biking again. It’s a matte color. Nothing fancy or outlandish. Fits well. Middle of the road price. Happy with the purchase
customer_reviews.author: Vickie Barrientos

customer_reviews.title: If you value your head...This is the helmet for you.
customer_reviews.text: Solid construction. More internal structural reinforcement than other manufactures use. Helmet is very light and form fitting. Strap adjustments are easily made for proper fit. Bought it for my wife and she loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Grand Imagineer

customer_reviews.title: Dial-adjuating fit makes this helmet a great buy.
customer_reviews.text: I'm really happy to have spent the extra few bucks on this helmet. The helmet dial-fit makes for a really comfortable feel. The chin strap is padded and provides more comfort than the usual basic buckle fit I expected. And above all else, the customer service was great. I had thought I ordered the incorrect size, and the company responded to my concerns promptly by assuring me they would happily send me the right fit if there was an issue. Turns out it fits great. I highly recommend this helmet and company.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher

customer_reviews.title: Great helmet
customer_reviews.text: I like this helmet! I ride a handcycle. So I'm laying down, and I notice the helmets gets loose in this position, but considering most people wont have this problem I still have it 5 stars
customer_reviews.author: Amh

customer_reviews.title: Great helmet at a very fair price!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice, light, well-fitting, adjustable helmet! It feels good on my head unlike the old one which feels somewhat like a padded pot. I have looked at lots of helmets and never expected to find this nice a helmet at any price. I will be back after a while to report on how well it performs over time.
customer_reviews.author: Connie

customer_reviews.title: Prevented an Injury
customer_reviews.text: I took a spill on my bike and this helmet did it's job. I was pretty scraped up and bruised on my left side, but nothing broken. The helmet has a minor crack in the external shell, but the internal lining has substantial cracking. I had a concussion test done and it came back negative so the helmet did it's job of absorbing the impact with the asphalt.
customer_reviews.author: BC

customer_reviews.title: Great Helmet
customer_reviews.text: Pleasantly surprised by this extremely lightweight, yet sturdy helmet. Plenty of air flow in hot weather. Very comfortable. It took some time to adjust the straps. Definitely a good investment!
customer_reviews.author: Thom

customer_reviews.title: Value
customer_reviews.text: Great helmet, good value. I did not try to buy the cheapest, because it’s my head and I would like to keep it in good condition. At the same time, I’m not interested in spending a fortune for something that I don’t plan to use. This product seems to strike a good middle ground and the helmet is very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: R. Highsmith

customer_reviews.title: TeamObsidian Premium Quality review
customer_reviews.text: Like: nothing Dislike: Slides on head even with straps.It should come already assembled. I plan on going to a bike shop and getting a bike helmet and have it adjusted while I'm there.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Holley Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: His helmet keeps me alive and is very lightweight. I was skeptical at first about the weight but it is extremely light weight compared to others I have been researching. I have been using it for now 2 years and it is holding up well. So far I haven’t been in an accident thank god. The strap cover under the chin fell apart a bit and the Velcro doesn’t hold very well. Will try to replace it somehow
customer_reviews.author: David Palacio

customer_reviews.title: Too  small
customer_reviews.text: They say a M/L will fit a large head, but it doesn't. Don't buy helmets that claim to span two sizes unless you are right in the middle. A helmet that is too big or too small is not safe.
customer_reviews.author: Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Good protection, great breathability, reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: Recently purchased this item for a little under $50 during a sale and have gone on a few short bike rides with it so far. No complaints so far. Straps are a bit tricky to adjust at first but allow good customizability once you figure it out. The helmet is reasonably lightweight and seems very sturdy. It offers great breathability due to the many vents. I can't speak for how well it works in the event of a fall and hope I will never need to find out!
customer_reviews.author: Will

customer_reviews.title: Size
customer_reviews.text: Measurements are incorrect. It's an oblong helmet so if u measure you have to take in to account the shape of ur head. I have a small size head based on defined measurements the company states. The helmet didnt come close to even closing over my head.
customer_reviews.author: mermaid starboard

customer_reviews.title: Great fit!
customer_reviews.text: First bike helmet I've bought in 20 years. Lightweight and comfortable. Chin strap very comfortable after initial fitting. No "hot spots" on head under padding.
customer_reviews.author: John W.

customer_reviews.title: Nice bike helmet!
customer_reviews.text: Like everything about this helmet. Lightweight, cool and good-looking. Works great as a road helmet. I was able to attach my mirror to the helmet without any issues. In fact, the visor helps keep it in place. Plus TeamObsidian sent me a couple small bike lights for registering the helmet. Very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Priscilla

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and easily adjustable
customer_reviews.text: I needed to replace my favorite, though heavy, helmet due to chronic neck issues. The TeamObsidian Airflow helmet is comfortable for long rides and pretty stable after quick adjustment out of the package. MIPS would be nice, but this is a good helmet at the price point.
customer_reviews.author: Squeegee60

customer_reviews.title: Great looking and comfortable helmet
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and lite. Easily adjusted to fine tune the fit with plenty of air vents to aid in cooling. Really glad I purchased this one.
customer_reviews.author: R. Andrus

customer_reviews.title: Sweeeeetttt
customer_reviews.text: I don't even like helmets but I'll wear this to weddings/funerals/graduations
customer_reviews.author: Andres Ponce

customer_reviews.title: He does not like to wear a helmet
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my husband. He does not like to wear a helmet, however since three family members recently had significant bicycle accidents that all required surgery, he relented and now wears this helmet every time he rides (he is a casual bike rider). He barely notices the helmet, as it is super lightweight and non-restricting. When the package arrived from Amazon, we nearly thought that they had made a mistake and sent us an empty box - that's how extremely lightweight this helmet is! I would highly recommend this product .
